channel.title: 2002 RuneScape site
channel.description:
This is something I'm working on for my project, ClassicLive.
I'm recreating the 2002 RuneScape site and implement my server with it.
Current features: - Counting Players online (when I select the right database :p )
[IMG]http://img11.imageshack.us/img11/9416/02og.png[/img]
Also, when you're interested in using this, contact me by private message. I might release if there's enough people asking for it

item.title: 2002 RuneScape site
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

[quote=“nacional, post:22, topic:529222”][quote author=-Nothing link=topic=647980.msg4359038#msg4359038 date=1378312845]
Has anybody found the skeleton & warrior images from the free/members world selection page?
[/quote]

It’s not this right?

wwDr43X.jpg1024×768

Also if not, let’s talk about this image anyways.

On the left is zamorak and on the right I can only guess is guthix(?).
Besides the really cool zamorak armor, only guthix catches my attention because of :

  1. He rolls the dice on the world, so he decides the outcomes of the world beings by dice.
  2. Guthix is half-human (feet)
    3.Guthix has a pet dragon (leash). Which hinted at least at some point there was gonna be pet implementation in rsc.
  3. Guthix’s pet looks a lot like Elvarg from the Dragon Slayer quest. And if we Elvarg as a scale, we know the gods are humongous.

reading too much into it? I’m I going crazy? you decide[/quote]
It’s not that, one of them were holding Free to play button and the other members world button. And later on, at RS2, it was to choose low or high detail.

Read full topic

item.title: 2002 RuneScape site

item.description:
@nacional wrote:

-Nothing:

Has anybody found the skeleton & warrior images from the free/members world selection page?

wwDr43X.jpg1024×768

Also if not, let’s talk about this image anyways.

On the left is zamorak and on the right I can only guess is guthix(?).
Besides the really cool zamorak armor, only guthix catches my attention because of :

  1. He rolls the dice on the world, so he decides the outcomes of the world beings by dice.
  2. Guthix is half-human (feet)
    3.Guthix has a pet dragon (leash). Which hinted at least at some point there was gonna be pet implementation in rsc.
  3. Guthix’s pet looks a lot like Elvarg from the Dragon Slayer quest. And if we Elvarg as a scale, we know the gods are humongous.

reading too much into it? I’m I going crazy? you decide

item.title: 2002 RuneScape site
item.dc:creator: @tigerclan tigerclan
item.description:
@tigerclan wrote:

[quote=“imthenull, post:20, topic:529222”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=647980.msg4359067#msg4359067 date=1378323851]
Just gonna throw in there towards hikilaka and the OP that HTML5 should be a necessity in pretty much any site written these days, remake or not. If it doesn’t scale well between mobile, tablets and other devices then its just really not up to scratch in my opinion. Who doesn’t browse the web on their phone or tablet these days?

Also hik, rather than linking the images through the way back machine I’d reupload them to imgur if you wanted to continue hosting them on the web. You might’ve just done that for that example on jsfiddle, though.
[/quote]m8 i’m 2 lazy[/quote]

aka the site wont get finished lol

Read full topic

item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

I like sinatra. I did some research on it last night. I think I’ll be using that. @OP have you considered rewriting the html to html5? I have begun doing so last night, http://jsfiddle.net/8Z9mY/15/

dat nav tag.

item.title: 2002 RuneScape site
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“imthenull, post:11, topic:529222”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=647980.msg4358736#msg4358736 date=1378236762]

[quote author=imthenull link=topic=647980.msg4358719#msg4358719 date=1378233178]

[quote author=Ruby link=topic=647980.msg4358704#msg4358704 date=1378228923]

Lol i did this before. I slowly started converting everything to PHP, I only did a small portion but it was fun.

I might work on it again, but in a different language… RoR

RoR has way to many backdoors, I don’t like it
[/quote]Really? I didn’t know that. I’ll have to look into it.

Lol i did this before. I slowly started converting everything to PHP, I only did a small portion but it was fun.

I might work on it again, but in a different language… RoR

Meh, I’d much prefer to use Sinatra if you were wanting to use a ruby framework. There’s still other better alternatives to that, though.
[/quote]I’ll check that out as well.

Check flask out while you’re at it too, great web framework in python.

I don’t like Python. at all.

I don’t like you. at all.

BUT I DEAL WITH YOU.
[/quote]you’re mean ;([/quote]kidding bby me n u 4evs

Read full topic
